products.name: Tex Viller - Dawn of Blood/The Last Stand
products.desc: After a bitter fight at Rochester, Tex and Professor Occultis are in a hurry to save the garrison of the Anderville fort from the combined Cheyenne and Black Foot siege!

products.name: Zagor - Eyes of the South
products.desc: A mysterious force is raising people from the dead along Mississippi...

products.name: Dylan Dog - Christmas Special
products.desc: Three previously unpublished adventures of your favorite detective of the surreal!

products.name: Commander Mark - Wolves of Ontario
products.desc: Will Commander Mark and his brave comrades manage to stop the British from disembarking on northern shores of the Ontario Lake?

products.name: Alan Ford - Super Hick Strikes Back
products.desc: Second part of the saga of Super Hick, the biggest villain in the history of villainous villains.

products.name: Zagor  - The Return of the Blondie
products.desc: The Blondie returns to haunt Zagor more than 20 years after her death. What does her reappearance mean for the ghost with the hatchet?
